one.description: For the number 1, close your fist with the thumb on the side of the index finger.

two.description: For the number 2, extend your fingers upwards with the thumb crossed in front of your palm.

three.description: For the number 3, curve your fingers and thumb to form the shape of the letter C.

four.description: For the number 4, hold up your index finger while the other fingers touch the thumb.

five.description: For the number 5, curl your fingers into your palm with the thumb resting on the tips.

six.description: For the number 6, touch your thumb and index finger together, forming a circle, with the other fingers extended.

seven.description: For the number 7, hold your index finger and thumb parallel, pointing to the side.

eight.description: For the number 8, extend your index and middle finger horizontally, with the thumb supporting the others.

nine.description: For the number 9, hold your pinky finger straight up with the other fingers curled into the palm.

ten.description: For the number 10, start with the I hand shape, then move your pinky finger in a J-shaped motion.
